name: BCaptcha
desc: Component wrapper for Google reCAPTCHA v2.

infoArray.name: grecaptcha
infoArray.desc: Using that component will oblige you to manage the grecaptcha dep and load the script by yourself.

infoArray.name: theme
infoArray.desc: light or dark The theme of the widget. Default light.

infoArray.name: type
infoArray.desc: image or audio The type of initial captcha. Default image.

infoArray.name: tabindex
infoArray.desc: The tabindex on the element. Default 0.

infoArray.name: size
infoArray.desc: compact, normal or invisible. This allows you to change the size or do an invisible captcha. Default normal.

infoArray.name: stoken
infoArray.desc: Set the stoken parameter, which allows the captcha to be used from different domains, see reCAPTCHA secure-token.

infoArray.name: badge
infoArray.desc: bottomright, bottomleft or inline. Positions reCAPTCHA badge. Only for invisible reCAPTCHA. Default bottomright.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.desc: The function to be called when the user successfully completes the captcha.

infoArray.name: onExpired
infoArray.desc: Callback when the challenge is expired and has to be redone by user. By default it will call the onChange with null to signify expired callback.
